name: agility
effect: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages.
short_effect: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.
